info.title: Kamwaalay API
info.description: API documentation for Kamwaalay - A platform connecting households with trusted domestic helpers

get.description: Get admin dashboard statistics and recent activity. Requires admin role.

403.description: Forbidden - Admin access required

get.description: Get paginated list of helpers with optional status filter. Requires admin role.

403.description: Forbidden - Admin access required

patch.description: Update helper verification status and active status. Requires admin role.

403.description: Forbidden - Admin access required

get.description: Get paginated list of all bookings with optional status filter. Requires admin role.

403.description: Forbidden - Admin access required

get.description: Get paginated list of all documents with optional status filter. Requires admin role.

403.description: Forbidden - Admin access required

patch.description: Update document verification status. Requires admin role. If all documents are verified, helper is automatically verified.

403.description: Forbidden - Admin access required

get.description: Returns login form configuration

post.description: Authenticates a user. If email/phone and password are provided, logs in directly. If only email/phone is provided, sends OTP for verification.

email.description: Email address (required if phone not provided)

phone.description: Phone number (required if email not provided)

password.description: Password (optional - if not provided, OTP will be sent

onboarding_complete.description: Whether the user has completed onboarding (helper/business: has service listings, normal user: has updated profile)

202.description: OTP sent for verification (when password not provided or account not verified)

message.example: Please check your email for the verification code.

verification_token.description: Token to use for OTP verification

post.description: Logs out the authenticated user and revokes their token

get.description: Get form data for resetting password with the provided token

post.description: Reset user password using the reset token received via email

put.description: Update the authenticated user's password. Requires current password confirmation.

get.description: Get form data for requesting a password reset link

post.description: Send a password reset link to the user's email address

message.example: We have emailed your password reset link.

422.description: Validation error or email not found

get.description: Get form data for user registration

post.description: Register a new user account. Requires OTP verification after registration. Either email or phone must be provided.

email.description: Either email or phone is required

phone.description: Either email or phone is required

message.example: Registration successful! Please check your email for the verification code.

get.description: Retrieve verification information for OTP verification. Requires verification_token.

parameters.name: verification_token
parameters.description: Encrypted verification token for verification flow

identifier.description: Email address or masked phone number

is_login.description: Whether this is a login or registration verification

message.example: Verification token has expired. Please login again.

post.summary: Verify OTP and complete registration or login
post.description: Verify the OTP code sent via email or phone. Completes user registration or login process. Returns authentication token on success. If email or phone is provided, it will be used directly for verification. Otherwise, the method uses verification_token.

email.description: Email address for verification (required if phone and verification_token not provided)

phone.description: Phone number for verification (required if email and verification_token not provided)

verification_token.description: Verification token for login flow (optional, required if email and phone not provided)

200.description: OTP verified successfully - Registration or login completed

onboarding_complete.description: Whether the user has completed onboarding (helper/business: has service listings, normal user: has updated profile)

message.example: Email verified successfully! Please complete your profile to start offering services.
Invalid or expired OTP. Please try again.

post.description: Resend the OTP verification code to the user's email or phone. Supports both login and registration flows. Requires either email, phone, or verification_token.

message.example: Verification code has been resent to your email.
Verification token has expired. Please login again.

get.description: Get form data for creating a service request with optional prefill data
Get paginated list of service requests created by the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new service request (booking). Only users and businesses can create requests, not helpers.

403.description: Forbidden - Helpers cannot create service requests

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific service request (public access)

booking.description: Booking object with user, assignedUser, review, and jobApplications

delete.description: Delete (cancel) a service request. Only booking owner can delete.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only delete own bookings

patch.description: Update booking status and notes. Only booking owner can update.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only update own bookings

get.description: Browse all available pending service requests (for helpers/businesses to apply)
Get a paginated list of active businesses with filtering options (public access)
Get detailed information about a specific business including service listings and helpers (public access)

business.description: Business user object with service listings and helpers

get.description: Get business dashboard statistics and recent activity

403.description: Forbidden - Only businesses can access dashboard

get.description: Get paginated list of workers associated with the business

403.description: Forbidden - Only businesses can view workers

post.description: Create a new worker account and associate it with the business

403.description: Forbidden - Only businesses can create workers

get.description: Get form data for creating a new worker

403.description: Forbidden - Only businesses can create workers

get.description: Get worker data for editing. Only business owner can edit their workers.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only edit own business workers

put.description: Update worker information. Only business owner can update their workers.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only update own business workers

delete.description: Remove a worker from the business. Only business owner can delete their workers.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only delete own business workers

get.description: Get a paginated list of verified helpers and businesses with filtering options

post.description: Create or update helper profile information

403.description: Forbidden - User is not a helper

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific helper including reviews, documents, and service listings

helper.description: Helper user object with reviews, documents, and service listings

403.description: Forbidden - Can only edit own profile

get.description: Get form data for creating a helper profile
Get helper profile data for editing

403.description: Forbidden - Can only edit own profile

get.description: Get home page data including featured helpers and platform statistics
Browse available service requests for helpers/businesses to apply. Requires completed onboarding.

403.description: Forbidden - Only helpers and businesses can browse

get.description: Get booking data for creating a job application. Requires helper/business role and completed onboarding.

403.description: Forbidden - Only helpers and businesses can apply

422.description: Onboarding not completed or already applied

post.description: Submit a job application for a service request. Requires helper/business role and completed onboarding.

403.description: Forbidden - Only helpers and businesses can apply

422.description: Validation error, onboarding not completed, or already applied

get.description: Get detailed information about a job application. Only owner, booking owner, or admin can view.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only view own applications or related bookings

delete.description: Delete a job application. Only applicant, booking owner, or admin can delete.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only delete own applications or related bookings

get.description: Get paginated list of job applications submitted by the authenticated helper/business

403.description: Forbidden - Only helpers and businesses can view their applications

get.summary: Get applications for my service requests
get.description: Get paginated list of job applications received for the authenticated user's service requests

200.description: List of applications for user's service requests

post.description: Accept a job application and assign the helper to the service request. Only booking owner can accept.

message.example: Application accepted! The helper has been assigned to your service request.

403.description: Forbidden - Only booking owner can accept

post.description: Reject a job application. Only booking owner can reject.

403.description: Forbidden - Only booking owner can reject

post.description: Withdraw a job application. Only applicant can withdraw.

403.description: Forbidden - Only applicant can withdraw

post.description: Changes the application language to the specified locale

get.description: Retrieves all translations for the specified locale

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Language locale code (en or ur). If not provided, uses session locale.

translations.description: Nested object containing translations from different files

get.description: Get list of all conversations for the authenticated user with last message and unread count
Get paginated messages for a specific conversation. Messages are ordered by created_at descending. Unread messages are automatically marked as read when fetched.

403.description: Forbidden - User is not part of this conversation

post.description: Send a message to a user. Creates a new conversation if one doesn't exist. The message is broadcast via Pusher to the recipient in real-time.

message.example: Hello, I'm interested in your service listing.
Hello, I'm interested in your service listing.

get.description: Get form data for helper onboarding. Requires helper role.

403.description: Forbidden - Only helpers can access

post.description: Complete helper onboarding by submitting services, NIC document, and profile information. Requires helper role.

nic.description: NIC document file (jpeg, jpg, png, pdf, max 5MB) - optional

403.description: Forbidden - Only helpers can complete onboarding

get.description: Get form data for business onboarding. Requires business role.

403.description: Forbidden - Only businesses can access

post.description: Complete business onboarding by submitting business information. Requires business role.

403.description: Forbidden - Only businesses can complete onboarding

get.description: Get about page content
Get contact page content

post.description: Submit a contact form message

message.example: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you soon.

get.description: Get FAQ page content
Get terms and conditions page content
Get privacy policy page content
Search Karachi locations for autocomplete (deprecated - use /api/locations/search)
Search locations (cities and areas) for autocomplete
Get the authenticated user's profile information

onboarding_complete.description: Whether the user has completed onboarding (helper/business: has service listings, normal user: has updated profile)

delete.description: Delete the authenticated user's account. Requires password confirmation.

patch.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

onboarding_complete.description: Whether the user has completed onboarding (helper/business: has service listings, normal user: has updated profile)

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's information with onboarding status

onboarding_complete.description: Whether the user has completed onboarding (helper/business: has service listings, normal user: has updated profile)

get.description: Get the authenticated user's uploaded documents
Get booking data for creating a review. Only booking owner can create reviews.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only review own bookings

post.description: Create a review for a completed booking. Only booking owner can create reviews.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only review own bookings

422.description: Validation error or review already exists

get.description: Get review data for editing. Only review owner can edit.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only edit own reviews

put.description: Update a review. Only review owner can update.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only update own reviews

delete.description: Delete a review. Only review owner can delete.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only delete own reviews

get.description: Get a paginated list of active service listings. Only visible to helpers and guests.

403.description: Forbidden - Service listings only available to helpers

post.description: Create a new service listing. Supports both single listing and multiple listings format.

listings.description: Array of listings (new format) - creates ONE listing with multiple service types and locations

403.description: Forbidden - Only helpers and businesses can create listings

422.description: Validation error or onboarding not completed

get.description: Get form data for creating a service listing. Requires helper/business role and completed onboarding.

403.description: Forbidden - Only helpers and businesses can create listings

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific service listing. Only visible to helpers and guests.

403.description: Forbidden - Service listings only available to helpers

put.description: Update a service listing. Only owner or admin can update.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only update own listings

delete.description: Delete a service listing. Only owner or admin can delete.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only delete own listings

get.description: Get service listing data for editing. Only owner or admin can edit.

403.description: Forbidden - Can only edit own listings

get.description: Get paginated list of service listings created by the authenticated user (helper/business)

403.description: Forbidden - Only helpers and businesses can view their listings
